title: By the King, a proclamation for calling home such of His Majesties subjects as are now abroad in the dominions or service of His Majesties enemies
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at the court at Whitehall the 29th day of March 1672. In the 24th year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
